job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Work together with us to bring our consumer data platform to the next level. We built a central consumer data platform that contains all interactions and engagements of our consumers with PostNL. Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.
   Neem contact op Geplaatst op 13 februari 2024Senior Software Developer Python
     * Den Haag/hybride
     * 37 uur per week
     * Senior
     * HBO/WO
     * IT - software development
     * € 4280 - € 6100 per maand

   Work together with us to bring our consumer data platform to the next level. We built a central consumer data platform that contains all interactions and engagements of our consumers with PostNL. Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.

   Visible Work:
   Challenge: Since we started our company more than two centuries ago, we have been able to disrupt the market and lead the way with technical innovation. Our goal: to remain the preferred delivery company in the Benelux, and we believe that technical innovation and logistical intelligence will help us do that. That's why we work with AWS Serverless solutions. Your knowledge, insights and commitment as a Senior Software Engineer are crucial to achieving our goals.
   Good atmosphere: You will work together with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and help each other move forward.
   Freedom: You will work from home and at a flex spot in our bustling, state-of-the-art office in the historic Stationspost building (next to Holland Spoor station).
   Responsibility: You will largely fill your position and working hours yourself.
   Development Opportunities: You will have ample opportunities to attend training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.
   Dit is jouw rol

   You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications. Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture. You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture. All modern technologies and our whole engineering community are here to support you. You will work together with allying platforms, peers, and colleagues in the consumer domain. Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
   Jouw collega's, Afhankelijk van de functie heb je één of meerdere gesprekken met onze recruiter, je toekomstige manager en directe collega's. Het eerste gesprek zal meestal online via video zijn.
     * 4Aanbieding
       Je ontvangt per e-mail een arbeidsvoorwaarden aanbod.
     * 5Nieuwe baan
       Je ondertekent je contract digitaal. Welkom bij PostNL!, As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI. You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
   Senior Integratie Engineer

   "Door de juiste integratie oplossingen te ontwikkelen zorg jij ervoor dat het applicatie- en IT landschap van PostNL keten breed op elkaar aansluit.".
   Dit is jouw rol

   You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications. Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture. You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture. All modern technologies and our whole engineering community are here to support you. You will work together with allying platforms, peers, and colleagues in the consumer domain. Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
   Hier kom je terecht

   Wij zijn PostNL. En samen met jou blijven we de favoriete bezorger. Dagelijks maken we 1,2 miljoen mensen blij met het bezorgen van bijzondere momenten. Dat kunnen we alleen dankzij jou en ons team mogelijk maken.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Developer Python

Work together with us to bring our consumer data platform to the next level. We built a central consumer data platform that contains all interactions and engagements of our consumers with PostNL. Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.

     * Den Haag/hybride

     * Senior
     * HBO/WO
     * IT - software development
     * € 4280 - € 6100 per maand

Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.

That's why we work with AWS Serverless solutions. Your knowledge, insights and commitment as a Senior Software Engineer are crucial to achieving our goals.

   Development Opportunities: You will have ample opportunities to attend training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.

Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture. profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development, data platform enhancement, and AWS serverless architecture. While it mentions 'generative AI' and 'data science' in a single sentence, the core responsibilities and technologies described (Python, AWS Serverless, microservices, CI/CD) are not specific to GenAI engineering. The role appears to be a Senior Software Developer with a focus on data platforms, rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'Senior Software Developer Python' and mentions building 'practical software applications' with Python, Serverless AWS infrastructure, CI/CD, and a microservices architecture.
The role involves translating complex business processes into practical software applications, a core software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: translating complex business processes, into practical software applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of CI/CD in a microservices architecture points to software development and deployment practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture

job_tasks.justification: The role involves thinking about software architecture and product improvements, which are part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture

job_tasks.justification: The job involves working with a 'consumer data platform' that supplies 'valuable data to other teams', indicating a need to understand business context and data usage.
job_tasks.phrase: bring our consumer data platform to the next level

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as critical in supplying data to other teams, highlighting its business importance.
job_tasks.phrase: Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.

job_tasks.justification: The goal of remaining the preferred delivery company and using technical innovation and logistical intelligence shows a connection to business strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: remain the preferred delivery company in the Benelux, and we believe that technical innovation and logistical intelligence will help us do that.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of AWS Serverless solutions and CI/CD points towards operational aspects of deploying and managing applications.
CI/CD is a key component of MLOps and DevOps for continuous integration and deployment.
